commit.message:
re PR middle-end/34608 (ICE with "-ftest-coverage -fopenmp")

	PR middle-end/34608
	* omp-low.c (expand_omp_parallel): Purge dead EH edges in the
	child fn.

	* g++.dg/gomp/pr34608.C: New test.

From-SVN: r131264
